projects.title: nextJSCrud
projects.description: nextJSCrud is a simple todo app built using NodeJS, NextJS, Expres and MongoDB stack. Its a very simple project that I was using to re-learn/ touch up on my skills with full-stack development

projects.title: ZRP
projects.description: ZRP is a fivem script. It is not fully complete, but has many advanced features and uses a custom made OOP system. Its built using LUA, Typescript and React. It has some nice custom features, but has an issue with its event system.

projects.title: FastDB
projects.description: FastDB is a WIP MongoDB explorer and editor, built using electron-forge. My goal was to create a very simple, and easy to use and look at MongoDB editor.

projects.title: ZiiMForge
projects.description: ZiiMForge is a WIP CurseForge clone, built using nextron. My goal was to recreate it with a little bit of a different UI.
